transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan sir, India Mart se bol raha hu sir.
Executive: [inaudible] sir. Haan haan. 10 minute mein call kariye sir, aa gaya hu, kar deta hu. Ek customer hai, kar deta hu.
Customer: Theek hai, toh 10 minute mein main aapko call kar aapke.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is calling from India Mart.



Resolution:

- Executive asked the customer to call back in 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

india mart, callback
